thread.title: Jim Wade
thread.title_full: Whitt Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Jim Wade

author: Jim Wade
title: Jim Wade
text: When we were remodeling our bathroom, we visited the Whitt Carpet One Floor showroom to look at their options for flooring They were so helpful and had many selections, found exactly what we had hoped for. The Installer was very knowledgeable, quick and efficient. We are very pleased with our new flooring. Definitely would recommend them to others.
